project.name: Internationalisation
project.description: The Internationalisation Subproject oversees and coördinates the translation efforts of the Gentoo Documentation Project.
project.longdescription: As Gentoo continues to grow, international documentation will be key to communicating with our diverse user base. The translators will make sure that all Gentoo documentation is translated in a timely fashion.

task.name: Translation
task.longdescription: The main goal of this project is to develop and maintain translated documentation in as many languages as possible.

milestone.description: Translate all documents and keep the translations in sync with the English documentation.

task.longdescription: Everything about this project can be found in GLEP 10.
